examples: Be humble enough to learn from your mistakes.
Sea lo suficientemente humilde para aprender de sus errores.
my humble tribute to this great man
mi humilde homenaje a este gran hombre
In my humble opinion, you were in the wrong.
En mi humilde opinión, estabas equivocado.
My humble apologies. I did not understand.
Mis humildes disculpas. Yo no entendía.
